00011 #include "types.h"

00013 class RandomNumberGenerator {
00014         private:
00015                 unsigned seed;
00016 
00017         public:
00018 
00019 
00020 // constructor
00021         RandomNumberGenerator(unsigned inputSeed) {
00022                 seed = inputSeed;
00023                 srand(seed);
00024         }
00025 
00026         // default constructor
00027         RandomNumberGenerator() {
00028                 //use the current time as seed for random numbers
00029                 seed = (unsigned)time(NULL);
00030                 srand(seed);
00031         }
00032 
00033         void SetSeed(unsigned inputSeed) {
00034                 seed = inputSeed;
00035                 srand(seed);
00036         }
00037 
00038 // produce a complex random number in [0, 1) + [0, 1)*I given the seed
00039         dcomplex randomComplex() {
00040                 double randomReal = (double)rand()/(double)RAND_MAX;
00041                 double randomImag = (double)rand()/(double)RAND_MAX;
00042                 dcomplex rc = dcomplex(randomReal,randomImag);
00043                 return rc;
00044         }
00045 
00046         // produce a complex random number in [0, 1) + [0, 1)*I given the seed
00047         double randomReal() {
00048                 double random = (double)rand()/(double)RAND_MAX;
00049                 return random;
00050         }
00051 
00052 
00053 };
00054 
00055 // generate a matrix of given dimension whose elements are random numbers in [0, 1)
00056 class RandomNumberMatrix {
00057 public:
00058         RandomNumberMatrix(int row_count, int col_count, unsigned seed) {
00059                 rows = row_count;
00060                 cols = col_count;
00061                 p = NULL;
00062                 p = new double[rows*cols];
00063                 rng.SetSeed(seed);
00064                 for (int i=0; i<rows*cols; i++) {
00065                         p[i] = rng.randomReal();
00066                 }
00067         }
00068 
00069         double operator()(const int r, const int c) const {
00070                 return p[r*cols + c];
00071         }
00072 
00073 
00074         ~RandomNumberMatrix() {
00075                 delete [] p;
00076                 p = NULL;
00077                 rows = 0;
00078                 cols = 0;
00079         }
00080 
00081 private:
00082         double *p;
00083         int rows;
00084         int cols;
00085         RandomNumberGenerator rng;
00086 };
00087 
00088 class OnsiteDisorder {
00089 public:
00090         OnsiteDisorder(int xmax, int ymax, unsigned seed) {
00091                 rows = xmax;
00092                 cols = ymax;
00093                 p = new double[rows*cols];
00094                 rng.SetSeed(seed);
00095                 for (int i=0; i<rows*cols; i++) {
00096                         p[i] = rng.randomReal();
00097                 }
00098         }
00099 
00100         double operator()(const int nx, const int ny) const {
00101                 return p[nx*cols + ny];
00102         }
00103 
00104         ~OnsiteDisorder() {
00105                 delete [] p;
00106                 p = NULL;
00107                 rows = 0;
00108                 cols = 0;
00109         }
00110 
00111 private:
00112         int rows;
00113         int cols;
